verses.verse: Be imitators <S%G3402><s%> of me, just <S%G2531><s%> as I also <S%G2532><s%> am of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I praise <S%G1867><s%> you because <S%G3754><s%> you remember <S%G3403><s%> me in everything, <S%G3956><s%> and hold <S%G2722><s%> firmly <S%G2722><s%> to the traditions, <S%G3862><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as I delivered <S%G3860><s%> them to you.

But I want <S%G2309><s%> you to understand <S%G3609><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and the man <S%G435><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of a woman, <S%G1135><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G435><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> [something] on his head <S%G2776><s%> while praying <S%G4336><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> prophesying, <S%G4395><s%> disgraces <S%G2617><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

But every <S%G3956><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> who has her head <S%G2776><s%> uncovered <S%G177><s%> while praying <S%G4336><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> prophesying, <S%G4395><s%> disgraces <S%G2617><s%> her head; <S%G2776><s%> for she is one <S%G1520><s%> and the same <S%G846><s%> with her whose head is shaved. <S%G3587><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> does not cover <S%G2619><s%> her head, let her also <S%G2532><s%> have her hair <S%G2751><s%> cut <S%G2751><s%> off; <S%G2751><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> it is disgraceful <S%G150><s%> for a woman <S%G1135><s%> to have her hair <S%G2751><s%> cut <S%G2751><s%> off <S%G2751><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> her head shaved, <S%G3587><s%> let her cover <S%G2619><s%> her head.

For a man <S%G435><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not to have his head <S%G2776><s%> covered, <S%G2619><s%> since he is the image <S%G1504><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> but the woman <S%G1135><s%> is the glory <S%G1391><s%> of man. <S%G435><s%>
For man <S%G435><s%> does not originate <S%G1510><s%> from woman, <S%G1135><s%> but woman <S%G1135><s%> from man; <S%G435><s%>
for indeed <S%G2532><s%> man <S%G435><s%> was not created <S%G2936><s%> for the woman <S%G1135><s%>'s sake, <S%G1223><s%> but woman for the man's sake. <S%G1223><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> [a symbol of] authority <S%G1849><s%> on her head, <S%G2776><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the angels. <S%G32><s%>

However, <S%G4133><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> is woman <S%G1135><s%> independent <S%G5565><s%> of man, <S%G435><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> is man <S%G435><s%> independent <S%G5565><s%> of woman. <S%G1135><s%>

For as the woman <S%G1135><s%> originates from the man, <S%G435><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the man <S%G435><s%> [has his birth] through <S%G1223><s%> the woman; <S%G1135><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> originate from God. <S%G2316><s%>
Judge <S%G2919><s%> for yourselves <S%G4771><s%>: <S%G846><s%> is it proper <S%G4241><s%> for a woman <S%G1135><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> [with head] uncovered <S%G177><s%>?

Does not even <S%G3761><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> you that if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> has <S%G2863><s%> long <S%G2863><s%> hair, <S%G2863><s%> it is a dishonor <S%G819><s%> to him,

but if <S%G1437><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> has <S%G2863><s%> long <S%G2863><s%> hair, <S%G2863><s%> it is a glory <S%G1391><s%> to her? For her hair <S%G2864><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to her for a covering. <S%G4018><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> is inclined <S%G1380><s%> to be contentious, <S%G5380><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G5108><s%> practice, <S%G4914><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> have the churches <S%G1577><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But in giving <S%G3853><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> instruction, <S%G3853><s%> I do not praise <S%G1867><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> not for the better <S%G2909><s%> but for the worse. <S%G7090><s%>

For, in the first <S%G4413><s%> place, when you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> as a church, <S%G1577><s%> I hear <S%G191><s%> that divisions <S%G4978><s%> exist <S%G5225><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you; and in part, <S%G3313><s%> I believe <S%G4100><s%> it.

For there must <S%G1163><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be factions <S%G139><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, in order <S%G2443><s%> that those <S%G3588><s%> who are approved <S%G1384><s%> may have become <S%G1096><s%> evident <S%G5318><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you.
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when you meet <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G1909><s%>, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> it is not to eat <S%G2068><s%> the Lord's Supper, <S%G1173><s%>

for in your eating <S%G2068><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> takes <S%G4301><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> first; <S%G4301><s%> and one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> is hungry <S%G3983><s%> and another <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> is drunk. <S%G3184><s%>

What! <S%G1063><s%> Do you not have <S%G2192><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%> in which to eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> do you despise <S%G2706><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and shame <S%G2617><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%>? What <S%G5101><s%> shall I say <S%G3004><s%> to you? Shall I praise <S%G1867><s%> you? In this <S%G3778><s%> I will not praise <S%G1867><s%> you.

For I received <S%G3880><s%> from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to you, that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the night <S%G3571><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> He was betrayed <S%G3860><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread; <S%G740><s%>

and when He had given <S%G2168><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> He broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is My body, <S%G4983><s%> which is for you; do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> in remembrance <S%G364><s%> of Me."

In the same <S%G5615><s%> way <S%G5615><s%> [He took] the cup <S%G4221><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> supper, <S%G1172><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> in My blood; <S%G129><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> as often <S%G3740><s%> as you drink <S%G4095><s%> [it,] in remembrance <S%G364><s%> of Me."

For as often <S%G3740><s%> as you eat <S%G2068><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup, <S%G4221><s%> you proclaim <S%G2605><s%> the Lord's death <S%G2288><s%> until <S%G891><s%> He comes. <S%G2064><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> drinks <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in an unworthy <S%G371><s%> manner, <S%G371><s%> shall be guilty <S%G1777><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> and the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
But let a man <S%G444><s%> examine <S%G1381><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> let him eat <S%G2068><s%> of the bread <S%G740><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> of the cup. <S%G4221><s%>

For he who eats <S%G2068><s%> and drinks, <S%G4095><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> if he does not judge <S%G1252><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> rightly.
For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you are weak <S%G772><s%> and sick, <S%G732><s%> and a number <S%G2425><s%> sleep. <S%G2837><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> we judged <S%G1252><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> rightly, we should not be judged. <S%G2919><s%>

But when we are judged, <S%G2919><s%> we are disciplined <S%G3811><s%> by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that we may not be condemned <S%G2632><s%> along <S%G4862><s%> with the world. <S%G2889><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> then, <S%G5620><s%> my brethren, <S%G80><s%> when you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> to eat, <S%G2068><s%> wait <S%G1551><s%> for one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is hungry, <S%G3983><s%> let him eat <S%G2068><s%> at home, <S%G3624><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that you may not come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> for judgment. <S%G2917><s%> And the remaining <S%G3062><s%> matters I shall arrange <S%G1299><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>
